sentences.sContent: Nutrition education can help with some problems and may prevent improper storage or spoilage.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nutrition education can help with some problems and may prevent improper storage or spoilage.
sentences.sCn: 营养教育可以解决一些问题，并能防止不当的贮存或腐坏发生。

sentences.sContent: Nutrition education can help with some problems and may prevent improper storage or spoilage.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nutrition education can help with some problems and may prevent improper storage or spoilage.
sentences.sCn: 营养教育可以解决一些问题，并能防止食物的不当贮存或腐坏发生。

sentences.sContent: They have real difficulty trying to tell the difference in quality changes and safety spoilage.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have real difficulty trying to tell the difference in quality changes and safety spoilage.
sentences.sCn: 他们真的很难区分真正的变质和无关紧要的损坏之间的区别。

words.tran: 宠坏；毁坏（spoil的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tranOther: waste resulting from something being spoiled
